channel.title: Amelio 1.1 Release (Reapage Scape 3 Beta)
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b][u]Amelio 1[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[b][u]About Amelio[/u][/b] Amelio is basically Allstar Cleaned 1u2. I like the name better, and figure I've made enough change to the source to call it my own. This is a project that has lasted a while, as I've been out of the RSPS scene for a while now, and I plan on completing it. My goal is to make the most stable Czar out there, and yes, put Allstar and stable in the same sentence.
So without further ado, lets get on with the updates. [hr]
[b][u]What I added:[/u][/b] Nothing. Nothing has been added to the release of Amelio 1. I don't plan on adding anything honestly, unless I feel it's necessary to improve the server source.
[u][b]Removed:[/b][/u] Over the long period of time that I've been working on this (on and off) I've removed around 7-8MB worth of garbage. I don't remember exactly what the client stood at in size for Allstar originally, but I've managed to get it down to 652Kb. I know, it's still incredibly large, but I suppose you could say I'm making progress.
[b][u]For the Future:[/u][/b] I'm hoping to make the server source more stable. Of course, this is the whole goal of the source, but lately I've just been removing unneeded bullshit. After looking into some things and talking to Conor (The Soul), I think I will be optimizing a lot of methods within the source as well as removing some that are unnecessary.
After I've optimized the source completely, I plan on using it for Reapage Scape 3.
[i][b]Main Directory -[/b][/i] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qxjk8o.png[/img][/center]
[i][b]Size -[/b][/i] [center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14lpz55.png[/img][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/v3gh0y.png[/img][/center] [hr]
[b][u]Download:[/u][/b]
Uppit - [size=8pt]Uppit is acting up at the moment.[/size]
FileFront - http://www.filefront.com/16027855/Amelio%201.1.zip
[i]If you want a different file hoster for the download, just request it or pm me.[/i] [hr]
[b][u]Credits: (updated if suggestions are taken)[/u][/b] [b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=274000]The Reaper X[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=287018]The Soul[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=258878]Allstar[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=124615]_Reforced[/url][/b]

item.title: Amelio 1.1 Release (Reapage Scape 3 Beta)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:30, topic:252065”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=332861.msg2599090#msg2599090 date=1230136238]

[quote author=Kihomura link=topic=332861.msg2598648#msg2598648 date=1230109286]
Why not clean out Project Czar? Allstar is just an edited Project Czar.
[/quote]How much did Allstar add onto it? Cuz by now i think it would be pointless to switch to Czar. I probably already removed most of the shit Allstar added to it, and then some.[/quote]

Well, from the sounds of this, you’ve removed only some of the stuff he has added. He’s added about 300KB onto the class client. Here’s some other things you should clean out:

-Clear out the first click NPC packet.
-Clear out the first click object packet
-Clear out the item-on-object packet
-Clear out the item-on-item packet
-Clear out the NPC dialogue (via chatbox, if it has it…)

There’s probably more from that. But he did add alot of shit into it.[/quote]Thanks. I cleared most of the NPC dialogue, I think i only left a few cases in there. As for the rest, I’m not completely sure. I’ll go through all of the things you just listed and then some. Once again, thanks ;]

Read full topic

-Clear out the NPC dialogue (via chatbox, if it has it…)

There’s probably more from that. But he did add alot of shit into it.
